content: using dk white yarn and 3 5mm hook chain 4 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 in last chain 3 single_crochet 2 4 slip_stitch fasten_off leaving long end for sewing beak 1 magic_ring 5 2 increase single_crochet x 2 increase 8 3 increase 2 single_crochet increase in next two st 2 single_crochet increase chain turn 4 single_crochet 4 slip_stitch leave long end for sewing stuff with a small amount of fibrefill and sew to close gap c sewitseams making up stuff the wings with fibre fill and position in place using pins the base of the wing should be at approximately round 11 and the top at round 17 sew to body using long ends and weave in using the long ends left from each piece sew the black pupils centrally over the whites of the eyes fasten_off on the back side of the piece concealing the end hold beak in position with pins and sew to body using long orange end between approximately rounds 17-20 pin and position the eyes close to the beak and sew to body using long white ends stuff feet with fibrefill position in place with pins centrally between rounds 2 and 3 and sew to body with long orange ends enjoy c sewitseams
